title: Bright Studio Apt. On Humboldt Park (incl heat, electr)
posting_body: Available August 1st, August15th or September 1st
*Large Studio *Approximately 780 sq. feet
*Vintage 7 foot bathtub in custom modern Okume wood cabinet dividing living space and  bath
*Impressive bath area (open shower with custom tile, water closet enclosed)
*bright, bright bright  5 windows with all-day Southern light
* tasteful kitchenette w/ maple bowling alley floor for counter, Euro sized 20" stove
* Whirlpool refrigerator
* Bosch Super Quiet dishwasher
*Concrete floors: bath area has a gorgeous grey/ blue matte finish and the living area Is polished with a light orange tint
*laundry in public area of building
* It is in the basement, but it does not feel like a basement(!): 9 ft.  ceilings, all-day sun, 24 recessed can lights in ceiling
* Directly across the street from Humboldt Park
*Fabulous, Fabulous parking 80% of time parking right in front of building, the rest of the time never more than 1/4 block away
*Very cool vintage Chicago 4 unit brick building w/ stained glass, nice woodwork, etc
* no pets preferred, pets may be negotiable
* $1290  INCLUDES heat and electricity); COOKING GAS paid by tenant
* Credit Check Screening  * References
* $290 move-in fee, no security deposit
*Great, Great (urban, arty, professional) neighbors / fellow tenants
*Pets may be negotiable
